Package MovieTheatres

Class Regular

java.lang.Object
MovieTheatres.Regular
All Implemented Interfaces:
Theatre
public class Regular extends Object implements Theatre
Inherits from theatre class to show the booking layout and to book seats for Regular Class cinema

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Regular(String bookedSeat)
    Creates a new Regular object using the bookedSeat String from ShowTime csv file Also, initialise all seats of cinema array to be empty initially

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    BookSeat(int row, int col)
    BookSeat function will help to book the seat.
    int
    getNumEmptySeats()
    Returns the attribute Empty to find the total number of empty seats
    int
    getTotalSeats()
    Returns the total number of seats that is computed by size * size Since is a square layout
    void
    initialLayout()
    Function that will traverse the bookedSeat string to check which seat is already booked So in bookedSeat string: "00", means that seat at row 0, col 0 is already taken If seat is booked then set the array to 1 while seat is not booked, set to 0
    boolean
    isFullyBooked()
    Returns boolean function If all seats are already taken then return true Else return false
    void
    printInitialLayout()
    Print initial layout of the cinema in 1 and 0.
    void
    showLayout()
    showLayout() will show the seat avaiability to the customer in the following format: 'O' means available 'X' means seat not available Seats without background are regualr seats Purple background: Elite seats Blue background: Platinum seats Red background: Ultimate seats Traverse the 2D array of the layout of movie theatre and prints out accordingly

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • initialLayout

      public void initialLayout()
      Function that will traverse the bookedSeat string to check which seat is already booked So in bookedSeat string: "00", means that seat at row 0, col 0 is already taken If seat is booked then set the array to 1 while seat is not booked, set to 0
      Specified by:
      initialLayout in interface Theatre

    • printInitialLayout

      public void printInitialLayout()
      Print initial layout of the cinema in 1 and 0.
      Specified by:
      printInitialLayout in interface Theatre

    • showLayout

      public void showLayout()
      showLayout() will show the seat avaiability to the customer in the following format: 'O' means available 'X' means seat not available Seats without background are regualr seats Purple background: Elite seats Blue background: Platinum seats Red background: Ultimate seats Traverse the 2D array of the layout of movie theatre and prints out accordingly
      Specified by:
      showLayout in interface Theatre

    • BookSeat

      public boolean BookSeat(int row, int col)
      BookSeat function will help to book the seat. If seat is already taken then will return false If seat is not taken then set the array to 1 and return true
      Parameters:
      row -
      col -
      Returns:
      true or false

    • getTotalSeats

      public int getTotalSeats()
      Returns the total number of seats that is computed by size * size Since is a square layout
      Returns:
      total seats

    • getNumEmptySeats

      public int getNumEmptySeats()
      Returns the attribute Empty to find the total number of empty seats
      Returns:
      Empty attribute

    • isFullyBooked

      public boolean isFullyBooked()
      Returns boolean function If all seats are already taken then return true Else return false
      Returns:
      true or false
